name: Super Plant Farm
description:
Super Plant Farm

What in tarnation?!? Them purple munchers're tryin' to eat up my crops! Heh, well little do they know this farm's packin' a secret: all my plants are made of live munition! I gotta plant the crops, then harvest 'em to get more powerful weapons. I can also water them to make them grow faster. Gotta harvest as many crops as I can before my field gets overrun!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

X - Jump

C - Shoot

Ranks:

5 points: Bronze

10 points: Silver

15 points: Gold
